title: Conductors - charges on spheres after contact

content.description: Which of the following correctly indicates the final charges on the spheres after they are separated and moved far away from each other?
content.question: Sphere <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> Sphere <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi> </math> A <math alttext="positive 5 nanocoulombs" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>nC</mi></math> <math alttext="positive 15 nanocoulombs" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>nC</mi></math> B <math alttext="positive 10 nanocoulombs" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>nC</mi></math> <math alttext="positive 10 nanocoulombs" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>nC</mi></math> C <math alttext="positive 15 nanocoulombs" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mn>15</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>nC</mi></math> <math alttext="positive 5 nanocoulombs" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>nC</mi></math> D <math alttext="positive 20 nanocoulombs" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mn>20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>nC</mi></math> <math alttext="0" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn></math>
